command: tellraw @p {"rawtext":[{"text":"You made a wild Sarcosuchus trust you! Keep feeding it every once in a while to eventually tame it!"}]}
tellraw @p {"rawtext":[{"text":"Your taming progress has been reset!"}]}
tellraw @p {"rawtext":[{"text":"You have succesfully tamed a Sarcosuchus!"}]}
tellraw @p {"rawtext":[{"text":"Costumes have been temporarily disabled until the next update."}]}
